#summary Arduino DMX transceiver shield with Xbee
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

DiMeX is an open source Arduino shield to enable the Arduino board to communicate over the DMX protocol. 


= Details =

It uses:<br>
digital pin *3* to send DMX signals <br>
digital pin *4* to switch between sending and receiving <br>
digital pin *5* to receive DMX signals <br>
